nodes.text: A Syndicat armor coat was a coat worn by the guards of the Syndicat, a criminal organization that controlled the planet Phindar during the days of the Old Republic. The armor included a coat and visor. The only spots that the armor did not protect were the neck and wrists, which Obi-Wan Kenobi and Qui-Gon Jinn exploited in 44 BBY.
